CustomField.description: US-0009278: Used to capture context / details regarding why an AU Onboarding project is on hold. This field is required if the "On Hold Reason" field is set to "Other".
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use this field to capture any further context regarding the reason for putting the project on hold. This field is required if the On Hold Reason field is set to "Other".
CustomField.label: On Hold Reason Details
